channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 20:59 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 20:59 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow further messages. #Odessa_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 18:21 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 18:21 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community#Харкивська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
